Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

For sometime I had been building ballistic missiles, they are fun to launch, guide, and watch as the wreak havoc upon......targets. But, I was wondering if it was possible to use Mechjeb's Autom8 to make the entire process programed. If yes, can I have a sample of the script codes.

I have near zero experience with autom8. If it is possible, I'd appreciate tips on whatever is linked to this topic.

Thank you.

Edited July 19, 2013 by DesertWolf
